name: Dark Aura
summary: Increases the damage dealt by Dark-type moves by 1/3 for all Pok√©mon on the field. Its effects are reversed by Aura Break.
viability: Dark Aura is a good ability for Yveltal, mostly because it usually runs Sucker Punch and/or Dark Pulse. Both have good power, and are made even better with Dark Aura. Both go from 80 base-powered moves to a great 104, with 100% accuracy.
